name: UpdateCustomAccountingField
description:
Update a custom accounting field with new information.

This tool updates a custom accounting field specified by a field ID. Use this when you need to modify the details of a particular accounting field.

parameters.name: custom_field_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the custom accounting field you want to update. This is required to specify which field to modify.

parameters.name: field_display_name
parameters.description: The new display name for the custom accounting field on Ramp.

value_schema.description: Update the name of the custom accounting field on Ramp.

parameters.name: custom_accounting_field_name
parameters.description: The name of the custom accounting field to update on Ramp.

value_schema.description: Name of the custom accounting field.

parameters.name: field_is_splittable
parameters.description: Boolean to determine if the custom accounting field is splittable on Ramp.

value_schema.description: Update the is_splittable of the custom accounting field on Ramp.
